My First Post

```{r, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(openintro)
```

```{r}
data("helium")
helium2 <- helium %>% pivot_longer(c(air, helium), names_to = "fill", values_to = "distance")
helium2 %>% ggplot(aes(distance, fill = fill)) + geom_density(alpha = .5)
```
